title: Lesson Study-Based Teacher Professional Development: Reflective Practice for Language Education Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in primary language education and possession of basic pedagogical knowledge
context.additional_context: Environment enabling sharing and collaboration on lesson materials designed using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Participants apply at least three reflective practice strategies when designing language lessons through lesson study workshops.
Participants provide at least five actionable feedbacks for improving language teaching methodologies through collaborative discussions with peer teachers.
Participants systematically document the lesson design-execution-observation-reflection process and submit it for project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
